Interface PipelineElement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Plugboard, Reflector, Rotor

    public interface PipelineElement

    An interface that is used for modeling the pipeline data structure.

    Author:
    Theodor Stoican

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char receiveOutput()
      A method that can be overriden for getting back the input that was earlier codified.
      void transmitInput(char input, java.lang.String type)
      A method that can be implements by Enigma components for receiving an input, for codifying it and storing it.

    • Method Detail

      • transmitInput

        void transmitInput(char input,
                 java.lang.String type)

        A method that can be implements by Enigma components for receiving an input, for codifying it and storing it.

        Parameters:
        input - the input to be codified
        type - the type of mapping (direct or inverse)

      • receiveOutput

        char receiveOutput()

        A method that can be overriden for getting back the input that was earlier codified.

        Returns:
        char an encoded character
